styles.livee: display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 10px; padding: 8px 15px; margin: 5px 0; border: 2px solid #000; border-radius: 5px; background-color: red; color: white; cursor: pointer; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
styles.liveeNote: background-color: white; color: black; padding: 5px 10px; margin: 0 auto 10px; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 13px; text-align: center; max-width: 500px;
